resources.string: You do not have maps in the OsmAnd application. Please download map(s) and restart the Sample.\n\nDo not forget to set OsmAnd General settings > Data storage folder to Shared memory.
The OsmAnd application not found. Please install OsmAnd and download maps.
NOTE: After OsmAnd will be installed, you need to set OsmAnd General settings > Data storage folder to Shared memory
